billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Directs telecommunication and cable corporations to provide call center service assistance from centers located within the state
summary: Directs telecommunications and cable corporations to provide call center service assistance from centers located within the state and such corporations' service area; includes a list of what services must be provided.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the general business law, in relation to telecommunications and cable call centers
